amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide findings for the need for and efficacy of the Neighborhood Stabilization Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 112-34 to provide findings for the need for and efficacy of the Neighborhood Stabilization Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 244 (Roll no. 183).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Ellison.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
